response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that is truly invaluable and worth $1,500,000 to you. I understand the significance of this item in your endeavors and am confident it will serve you exceptionally well. Considering its immense value and the importance it holds for you, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase the product at a special price of $1,250,000. This represents a significant saving of $250,000 compared to its full value, making it an attractive proposition for someone as discerning as yourself. I trust this offer will be favorable and look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1250000}
